com.orsoncharts.renderer

Interface ColorScale

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedColorScale, GradientColorScale, RainbowScale

    public interface ColorScale
    A color scale converts a data value into a color according to some predefined color scale.
    Since:
    1.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Range getRange()
      Returns the range over which the scale is defined.
      java.awt.Color valueToColor(double value)
      Returns the color on the scale that corresponds to the specified value.

    • Method Detail

      • getRange

        Range getRange()
        Returns the range over which the scale is defined.
        Returns:
        The range (never null).

      • valueToColor

        java.awt.Color valueToColor(double value)
        Returns the color on the scale that corresponds to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        value - the value.
        Returns:
        The color (never null).
